name: Let's Design A Visual Novel
description:
My first attempt at a visual novel using Renpy. Completed over the course of 6 weeks, it was my final project for my first game design class, and first time working with a "team".

If you're wondering why the sprites look familiar, our artist got lazy and instead of drawing, she just went to Chibi Maker. Writing was done by a guy who barely spoke English, fresh from Mexico, compilation and programing done by me. You can tell this was a wild experience for me.
